{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:24.260
    | text      = In 2010, Rainbow Acres Farm was raided in the culmination of a drawn out sting operation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:29.140
    | text      = The issue was not cheese.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:30.140
    | text      = It was the fact that Rainbow Acres sold tons of raw milk, which has been illegal to sell
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:34.340
    | text      = across state lines since 1984.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:37.300
    | text      = In a state, rules about raw milk are left up to the state's discretion, but federal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:40.899
    | text      = law prohibits interstate sales and for a good reason.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:44.380
    | text      = Raw milk is not pasteurized, and as such, there's no good protection against things
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:49.260
    | text      = like E. coli, salmonella, and the pathogens responsible for causing tuberculosis and typhoid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:55.539
    | text      = In the decade between 1998 and 2008, over a thousand illnesses, 104 hospitalizations,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:01.899
    | text      = and two deaths were proven to be caused by drinking raw milk.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:05.220

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:09.979

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:10.979
    | text      = Those people are dumb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:11.979
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:12.979
    | text      = Rainbow Acres was selling a lot of raw milk outside of Pennsylvania.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:16.699

}}

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:28.420
    | text      = This is a really large operation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:30.500
    | text      = One of the ways that these farms try to get around the law is by doing what's known as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
